interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil Pure Butter infused with Tea Tree Oil, 4 Oz
Review Date: 2022/07/04
Store: Sunny Isle
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sunny Isle', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive, Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 3.9 x 2.56 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '850006021659', 'Manufacturer': 'JBC Distributors Inc. (Sunny Isle)'}
Review Text: This smells like Castor oil and tea tree, no surprise there.  It is very heavy so it can weigh down hair and make it greasy and feel greasy on dry skin.  I found taking a little in my hands and rubbing vigorously before applying to warm it up helps to not use too much.  I try to melt it really good in my hands first.  It can be challenging to wash off, so use a small amount and heat it up well with your hands to get the thinnest layer possible for best results.
Review Title: Heavy oil
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Straight 13x4 Lace Front Wigs Burgundy Lace Front Wigs Long Bob Synthetic Ombre Wine Red Wig Pre-plucked with Baby Hair Free Part Heat Resistant Synthetic Lace Wigs for Women 20 Inch NOBLE {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'NOBLE', 'Package Dimensions': '13.74 x 7.87 x 2.2 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} Looks really nice. It's easy to use and looks natural. It has a good weight to it. It even came with some eyelashes. Good color Dreamemo 48W UV LED Nail Lamp, with 4 Timer Setting, Professional Pink Nail Dryer for Gel Nail Polish Gel Nail Starter Kit for Fingernail and Toenail Curing Dreamemo {'Style': 'Traditional', 'Brand': 'Dreamemo', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Wattage': '48 watts', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 8.58 x 4.37 inches; 1.63 Pounds'} Love this. Great for nails and those of use who might be a little clumsy and "miss" the opening smearing polish on the light. Works great. Lots of nails in it's future. wide opening Sam&Helen Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit, 5Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes And 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliners With Eyelash Applicator-No Glue Needed Sam&Helen {'Brand': 'Sam&Helen', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} I have a few friends who have tried similar products and I was curious. The liner is thick and has almost a rubbery feel. Even with makeup remover I found it quite challenging to remove. Make sure to mix it before applying. It took me three coats to get the lashes to stay. Make sure to let it dry all the way. The lash options are helpful to get the right look. challenging to remove Emilia Hypoallergenic Bath Oil for Babies - Paraben-Free Natural Baby Wash Enriched With Natural Oat Extract, Sunflower, Sweet Almond, Sesame, Calendula, and Chamomile 8.5 fl.oz. Emilia {'Brand': 'Emilia', 'Scent': 'Chamomile', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.81 x 2.05 x 1.85 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} I really like the smell. It is easy to add to my daughters bath and she comes out soft and ready for night time. It leaves her skin soft but not oily and doesn't cause her sensitive skin any trouble. Relaxing LAPOTHICELL Blemish Out Cream 50ml, Face Moisturizer, improves uneven skin tone. LAPOTHICELL {'Brand': 'LAPOTHICELL', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 3.42 Ounces'} I've fallen in love with a couple Korean beauty products so I was excited to try this one. It came in a cute little pink box. The outside of the container was clean. I have combination skin and I am prone to hormonal breakouts. Using this twice a day seems to help my blemishes heal faster and not get as bad. My skin feels very healthy after using this regularly. I have sensitive skin and have not had any problems. Great for blemishes EZ Detangler Brush, Morgles 2 Pack Detangling Brush for Curly Hair Ez Hair Detangling Brush for Afro America/ African Hair 3a to 4c Wavy Hair MORGLES {'Brand': 'MORGLES', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Wavy,Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '9.69 x 2.99 x 1.38 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Really easy to use brush that is great for all hair types. My daughter has curly hair and this brush makes it so much easier to brush her hair. She is more willing to sit for me to brush and style her hair and doesn't complain. Then she attempts to brush my hair (still developing that skill). Great for tangly hair Onkessy Lip Gloss Base Primer for DIY Lip Gloss Make Your Own Lip Gloss DIY Handmade Lip Gloss Glaze Gel Waterproof Non-Stick Cup 50/80ML Onkessy {'Brand': 'Onkessy', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Smoothening', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 3.07 x 1.26 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} The volume is accurate to the ad for the lipgloss base. It works well, I mix with Shae butter, vitamin e and pigment. It is a good volume for my daughter and I to make homemade lipgloss but if making gifts or anything more than a handful of tunes this is a small volume. Mine did not come with the non stick bowl the ad mentions. It seems a little pricey but works well and my sensitive skin does not react to it. Works well Swiss Botany Pueraria Mirifica Breast Lifters for Women - Breast Enlargement Serum with Pure Pueraria Mirifica Oil for Breast Firming, Lifting and Fuller, Bigger Breast - Large 2oz Bottle Swiss Botany {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 4 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Swiss Botany'} Between breastfeeding and weightloss my breasts are saggy and not full. It's been a hard adjustment. I know no cream or non surgical option will give me results like surgery would. The cooper's ligaments once stretched will not suddenly retract from a serum.
This serum is light and easy to apply. It does not irritate my sensitive skin and leaves it moisturized. I also use a hyaluronic serum.
That being said I have noticed a small improvement. They look a little fuller, not a measurable difference but to my eye they look a little less sad. This in theory increases estrogen activity locally to increase the fullness of the breast tissue. This will not replace a surgical breast lift but for minor changes it works for me. Subtle changes Kidskin- Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil- Helps Combat Body and Foot Odor and Stubborn Body Acne and Skin Issues - Cruelty Free, Gluten Free, Paraben Free, Sulfate Free, Unscented, and Vegan- Made in USA Kidskin ['Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is designed exclusively for teens, tweens, pre teens, and boys and girls to work as an effective, yet gentle body wash. Natural ingredients like Allantoin and Bisabolol nourish beyond surface level, and penetrate into the lower levels of the skin for the deepest hydration possible, while active ingredient tea tree oil works to fight body acne and skin issues teens are commonly prone to. Unlike shower bars and other soaps, our products are designed to soothe problematic and compromised skin. With 100% Natural ingredients that are paraben, sulfate, fragrance, and gluten free, the Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is gentle enough for every day use. Our mission is to provide teens (like our own!) with a body wash that leaves them feeling fresh and confident so they can focus on what really matters- every day. Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Extract, Polysorbate-20, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, ^ Glycerin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride), Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Allantoin, Bisabolol'] {'Item Form': 'Bar, Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Kidskin', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 2.83 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '4012', 'UPC': '880628401263', 'Manufacturer': 'Kidskin'} This really helped with the acne on my back and left my skin feeling smooth and healthy. It foams out of the pump with the amount I need for a single use. I keep the cap on it when I am not using it to keep it clean. So far it is lasting well and I have been using it for several weeks as a daily wash. It does not dry my skin out. Awesome KISSNOWY Manga Lashes Natural Look , Single Individual Lashes Wispy Cluster Lashes Extension for Cosplay Japanese Anime Makeup False Lashes (F-01) KISSNOWY {'Brand': 'KISSNOWY', 'Material': 'Faux,Faux Mink,Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.39 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Item model number': '6D-05', 'UPC': '608018540503 608576075066'} These are on the dramatic side for me but not the most dramatic ones I've used. They are reusable and more comfortable than I expected to wear. They do not come with eyelash glue. They come staged on thin white plastic that I use to store them. Dramatic and easy to use Unicorn Snot Lightning Drops - Liquid Highlighter & Bronzer Makeup - Face, Eyeshadow, Body Shimmer & Glitter - Cruelty Free (DIVA) UNICORN SNOT {'Item Form': 'Drops,Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Brand': 'UNICORN SNOT', 'Color': 'silver', 'Package Dimensions': '2.9 x 1.1 x 1 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '811935023596'} I really like show sheer this unicorn snot is but it layers well for a more saturated look. It adds a nice sheer highlight but also makes a pretty eye shadow. I have trouble getting the product out which is really frustrating. I've tried shaking it, tapping it on my skin etc. Hopefully with more experience I can get better at applying these unicorn drops. I got the Diva. Hard to dispense ANGNYA 6Pcs Nail Art Brushes Set Gel Nail Polish Design Pen Painting Tools With Nail Extension Gel Brushs,Builder Gel Brush,Nail Art Liner Brush for Salon at Home DIY Manicure(Pink) ANGNYA {'Brand': 'ANGNYA', 'Head Material': 'Nylon', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 3.7 x 0.98 inches; 3.84 Ounces'} These brushes work really well. The bristles were very stiff until the first use. They come with covers to protect the bristles. I noticed each had some bristles that were longer than the rest so I had to cut them down. The handles are decent and long enough to get good manipulation. I was able to do some fun designs on my nails with my gel polish. I also like the variety that comes in this pack so I can find the right shaped brush for what I am trying to do. Good assortment Premium Taza Natural Moroccan Argan Oil Rosemary Lavender Conditioner, 16 fl oz (473 ml) ♦ For Healthy, Smooth, Silky Hair ♦ Contains: Moroccan Argan Oil, Broccoli Seed Oil, Pro Vitamin B5, Hydrolyzed Taza {'Brand': 'Taza', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.48 x 2.48 x 8.27 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '628451263616'} I opened the bottle and noticed the product only comes up to the shoulder of the bottle which I found strange. The bottle is sealed under the cap and has a plastic wrap on the outside of the top. I noticed the smell right away, I really like the rosemary smell. It felt nice in my hands and I went to distribute it in my hair it took a lot more product than I usually use and my hair didn't feel silky like it usually does. I really didn't like the way my hair felt when I applied it. Once dry it doesn't weigh down my soft fine waves and still has a little of the conditioner smell which I enjoyed. I don't think my hair is significantly less frizzy than when I use the products I usually use but my hair does seem less weighed down. I am still on the fence on this one, maybe with more regular use I will like it more. Love the smell, undecided on hair 8PC Lazy Bird's Nest Plate Hairpin Velvet Bird Nest Shaped Hair Clips Expandable Ponytail Holder Hair Loops Nest Plate Hairpin Hair Claw Clip barrette AhkeaDirectly {'Brand': 'AhkeaDirectly', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Resin', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.02 x 5.2 x 2.32 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '761312153890'} If you can get past the prongs on the inside I love these because they don't crimp my hair like a hair tie and are much more gentle on my hair. It's so easy to use these to make a volume pony or even messy bun style. I am still trying new hair styles. I have fine hair which these are fantastic for! Easy and great for fine curly hair mold remover gel (3 Pack) Yondarli {'Brand': 'Yondarli', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.94 x 2.76 x 1.77 inches; 7.13 Ounces'} I wore gloves to apply this because I have sensitive skin. It was pretty easy to apply and I made sure to do so liberally. I waited several hours before scrubbing it off and it worked quite well. I found it easy to open and easy to apply. I did leave the fan on in the bathroom to remove odor. Easy to use, wear gloves Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil Pure Butter infused with Tea Tree Oil, 4 Oz Sunny Isle {'Brand': 'Sunny Isle', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive, Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 3.9 x 2.56 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '850006021659', 'Manufacturer': 'JBC Distributors Inc. (Sunny Isle)'} This smells like Castor oil and tea tree, no surprise there. It is very heavy so it can weigh down hair and make it greasy and feel greasy on dry skin. I found taking a little in my hands and rubbing vigorously before applying to warm it up helps to not use too much. I try to melt it really good in my hands first. It can be challenging to wash off, so use a small amount and heat it up well with your hands to get the thinnest layer possible for best results. Heavy oil
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Preferences:** The user favors modern, straight hairstyles in bold colors like burgundy and ombre shades, with a focus on ease of use and a natural appearance in hair products. They appreciate products that enhance smoothness and manage frizz.

- **Material Preference:** Prefers synthetic hair that mimics human hair quality, especially heat-resistant styles, while also exploring natural products for hair conditioning and skin care.

- **Functional Features:** Values realistic styling attributes such as pre-plucking and baby hair, alongside natural ingredient profiles promoting hair and skin health.

- **Review Focus:** The user prioritizes aesthetics, application ease, and overall satisfaction. They seek beauty tools, makeup products, and hair care items that enhance convenience and user experience, appreciating sensory aspects like fragrance.

- **Recent Interactions:** They rated a body wash 5.0 for acne effectiveness, reviewed lashes at 4.0 for comfort, and rated a liquid highlighter 4.0, expressing frustration with its dispensing method. They continued to show interest in hair conditioning but had mixed feelings about a new conditioner despite enjoying its scent.

- **Nail Art Interest:** They purchased high-quality nail art brushes for effective home manicures, reflecting their commitment to practical beauty solutions.

- **Latest Purchase Insight:** They acquired hair clips suitable for fine, curly hair, indicating a preference for user-friendly accessories.

- **Recent Cleaning Product Interaction:** They rated a mold remover gel 4.0, appreciating its ease of use while highlighting the need for gloves due to sensitive skin.

- **New Skin Care Interaction:** They recently reviewed a hair and skin butter, noting its heavy texture but also discussing application techniques for better results.
